title: Freedom Scientific Jaws 15.0.9023 ENU, 64-bit
description:
Freedom Scientific Jaws for Windows v15.0.9023 64-bit, English -US

This archive contains the setup file for Jaws 15.0, installation files for Video Intercept Manager and Freedom Scientific OCR, and the crack for using Jaws with no limits. All files, including the crack, don't contain any virus, spyware, worm or trojan. It's safe to install and works with no problems. Find more about Jaws for Windows here: <a href="
http://freedomscientific.com/Products/Blindness/Jaws" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://freedomscientific.com/Products/Blindness/Jaws</a>

How to install
------------------------
1. Download the torrent first, and seed it if you wish :)
2. Extract the rar archive on the hard drive, use an archiver for this (WinRar, 7Zip, etc.). For archive password, enter the beginning letters of the program name (it has 3 words, write it with lowercase)
3. Find the file J15.0.9023ENU-64bit.exe and run it.
4. Follow the instructions given on the screen (or listen it threw speakers) to install Jaws, restart your computer if you're asked to do so.
5. When setup completes, shut down the program (in Jaws menu, go to Options, then Exit and click OK).
6. Navigate to the crack folder, along with the Jaws setup files. Copy and replace the files jfw.exe and jhook.dll to the following directories:
C:Program FilesFreedom ScientificJaws15.0
C:Program FilesFreedom ScientificRuntime Jaws15.0
7. Run Jaws and enjoy!
